sentences.en: Tip No. 2: Speak out loud. Don't only listen, don't only read. You must speak English to improve your speaking.
sentences.zh: 建议2：大声说出来。不要只听，不要只读。你必须说英语才能提高口语能力。
sentences.phonetic_us: /tɪp ˈnʌmbər tu: spik aʊt laʊd. doʊnt ˈoʊnli ˈlɪsən, doʊnt ˈoʊnli rid. ju mʌst spik ˈɪŋɡlɪʃ tə ɪmˈpruv jʊr ˈspikɪŋ/

sentences.en: Speak out loud every day, talk to yourself in English.
sentences.zh: 每天大声说出来，用英语自言自语。
sentences.phonetic_us: /spik aʊt laʊd ˈɛvri deɪ, tɔk tə jɔrˈsɛlf ɪn ˈɪŋɡlɪʃ/

sentences.en: Yes, it may feel strange at first, but it really works.
sentences.zh: 是的，一开始可能会觉得奇怪，但这真的有效。
sentences.phonetic_us: /jɛs, ɪt meɪ fil streɪndʒ æt fɜrst, bʌt ɪt ˈrɪli wɜrks/

sentences.en: You can describe the room around you, you can talk about what you're doing, you can share a memory or story from your life, you can say your thoughts in English.
sentences.zh: 你可以描述你周围的房间，你可以谈论你在做的事情，你可以分享你生活中的一段记忆或故事，你可以用英语表达你的想法。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ju kæn dɪˈskraɪb ðə rum əˈraʊnd ju, ju kæn tɔk əˈbaʊt wʌt jʊr ˈduɪŋ, ju kæn ʃɛr ə ˈmɛməri ɔr ˈstɔri frʌm jʊr laɪf, ju kæn seɪ jʊr θɔts ɪn ˈɪŋɡlɪʃ/

highlight_entries.display_text: share a memory or story from your life
highlight_entries.translation_zh: 分享你生活中的一段记忆或故事

sentences.en: For example: I'm cooking dinner now, I'm making pasta, it smells good. Or yesterday I went to the park, as so many people, the weather was nice.
sentences.zh: 例如：我现在在做晚餐，我在做意大利面，闻起来很香。或者昨天我去公园了，那里有很多人都，天气很好。
sentences.phonetic_us: /fɔr ɪɡˈzæmpəl: aɪm ˈkʊkɪŋ ˈdɪnər naʊ, aɪm ˈmeɪkɪŋ ˈpɑstə, ɪt smɛlz ɡʊd. ɔr ˈjɛstərˌdeɪ aɪ wɛnt tə ðə pɑrk, æz soʊ ˈmɛni ˈpipəl, ðə ˈwɛðər wəz naɪs/

sentences.en: It doesn't matter if you make mistakes, just speak.
sentences.zh: 犯错没关系，只要开口说。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ɪt ˈdʌzənt ˈmætər ɪf ju meɪk mɪˈsteɪks, dʒʌst spik/

highlight_entries.display_text: It doesn't matter if you make mistakes

sentences.en: This helps your brain get used to making English sentences, it also helps you feel more confident.
sentences.zh: 这有助于你的大脑习惯造英语句子，也能让你感到更自信。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ðɪs hɛlps jʊr breɪn ɡɛt juzd tə ˈmeɪkɪŋ ˈɪŋɡlɪʃ ˈsɛntənsɪz, ɪt ˈɔlsoʊ hɛlps ju fil mɔr ˈkɑnfədənt/

sentences.en: You will stop being afraid to speak, you will learn how to think in English.
sentences.zh: 你会不再害怕开口说，学会用英语思考。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ju wɪl stɑp ˈbiɪŋ əˈfreɪd tə spik, ju wɪl lɜrn haʊ tə θɪŋk ɪn ˈɪŋɡlɪʃ/

sentences.en: You can do this in your room, in your car, or when you walk—anytime, anywhere.
sentences.zh: 你可以在房间里、车里，或走路时做这件事——随时随地都可以。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ju kæn du ðɪs ɪn jʊr rum, ɪn jʊr kɑr, ɔr wɛn ju wɔk—ˈɛniˌtaɪm, ˈɛniˌwɛr/

sentences.en: So remember, speak out loud every day, even 5 minutes helps.
sentences.zh: 所以记住，每天大声说出来，即使每天只说5分钟也有帮助。
sentences.phonetic_us: /soʊ rɪˈmɛmbər, spik aʊt laʊd ˈɛvri deɪ, ˈivən faɪv ˈmɪnɪts hɛlps/
